channel.title: NDTV News Search Records Found 1000
channel.description: NDTV.com provides the latest information from and in-depth coverage of India and the world. Find breaking news, India news, top stories, elections, politics, business, cricket, movies, lifestyle, health, live TV, videos, photos and more.

item.title: Israel Conducts Preemptive Strike On Iran, Declares State Of Emergency

media:content.media:description: Israel said that it has declared a state of emergency.

item.description: Israel launched a "preemptive strike" on Iran, the country's defence minister said early Friday, after US President Donald Trump had warned that Israel could soon strike Iran's nuclear sites.
item.content:encoded: Israel launched a "preemptive strike" on Iran, the country's defence minister said early Friday, after US President Donald Trump had warned that Israel could soon strike Iran's nuclear sites.

item.title: North Korea Relaunches Damaged Destroyer: Report

media:content.media:description: A North Korean naval destroyer damaged in a botched launch last month has been relaunched.

item.description: A North Korean naval destroyer damaged in a botched launch last month has been relaunched, with leader Kim Jong Un presiding over the ceremony, South Korean news agency Yonhap reported early Friday, citing the North's state media.
item.content:encoded: A North Korean naval destroyer damaged in a botched launch last month has been relaunched, with leader Kim Jong Un presiding over the ceremony, South Korean news agency Yonhap reported early Friday, citing the North's state media.

item.title: Israel Could Strike Iran As Soon As Sunday: Report

media:content.media:description: Netanyahu raised the possibility of strikes in a phone conversation with US President Trump on Monday.

item.description: Israel is prepared to attack Iran in the coming days if Tehran rejects a U.S. proposal to limit its nuclear program, the Wall Street Journal reported on Thursday, citing U.S. and Israeli officials.
item.content:encoded: Israel is prepared to attack Iran in the coming days if Tehran rejects a U.S. proposal to limit its nuclear program, the Wall Street Journal reported on Thursday, citing U.S. and Israeli officials.

item.title: US Lawmakers Approve $9 Billion Of Elon Musk's Federal Cuts

media:content.media:description: The move comes days after Elon Musk's acrimonious exit from the Trump government.

item.description: US lawmakers on Thursday approved a White House request to claw back $9.4 billion from funding already allocated by Congress in a victory for President Donald Trump as he pushes to lock in spending cuts spearheaded by tech billionaire Elon Musk.
item.content:encoded: US lawmakers on Thursday approved a White House request to claw back $9.4 billion from funding already allocated by Congress in a victory for President Donald Trump as he pushes to lock in spending cuts spearheaded by tech billionaire Elon Musk.

item.title: US Sees No Immediate Reason To Ground Boeing 787 After Air India Crash

media:content.media:description: Over 240 killed in a fatal Air India plane crash near Ahmedabad airport on Thursday.

item.description: U.S. officials said on Thursday they have not seen any immediate safety data that would require halting Boeing 787 flights after a fatal Air India accident killed over 240 people.
item.content:encoded: U.S. officials said on Thursday they have not seen any immediate safety data that would require halting Boeing 787 flights after a fatal Air India accident killed over 240 people.

item.title: Iran Must End Nuclear Weapon Ambitions: Trump Ahead Of Next Round Of Talks

media:content.media:description: Trump said that US remains committed to resolving the Iran nuclear issue through diplomacy.

item.description: President Donald Trump on Thursday said the United States remains committed to resolving the Iran nuclear issue through diplomacy, but added that the Islamic Republic must first give up hopes of building a nuclear weapon.
item.content:encoded: President Donald Trump on Thursday said the United States remains committed to resolving the Iran nuclear issue through diplomacy, but added that the Islamic Republic must first give up hopes of building a nuclear weapon.

item.title: Watch: California Senator Handcuffed, Forcibly Removed From LA Press Conference

media:content.media:description: Senator Alex Padilla was forcibly removed from press conference as was tried to ask about LA raids.

item.description: California's stand-off with President Donald Trump's administration ratcheted up Thursday, after a sitting US senator was handcuffed and forcibly removed from a press conference on controversial immigration raids that have spurred days of protests.
item.content:encoded: California's stand-off with President Donald Trump's administration ratcheted up Thursday, after a sitting US senator was handcuffed and forcibly removed from a press conference on controversial immigration raids that have spurred days of protests.

item.title: World Leaders May Face Wildfire Smoke At Canada G7 Summit

media:content.media:description: Tens of thousands of people have been evacuated from communities across western Canada due to wildfire.

item.description: World leaders may face smoke warnings when they gather next week in Alberta as wildfires burned out of control across much of Canada and caused the country's second-worst fire season in decades.
item.content:encoded: World leaders may face smoke warnings when they gather next week in Alberta as wildfires burned out of control across much of Canada and caused the country's second-worst fire season in decades.

item.title: 4.6 Magnitude Earthquake Hits Pakistan, No Casualties Reported

media:content.media:description: Pakistan Earthquake: No immediate damage or casualties were reported following the tremors.

item.description: An earthquake of magnitude 4.6 jolted Pakistan, a statement by the National Center for Seismology (NCS) said.
item.content:encoded: An earthquake of magnitude 4.6 jolted Pakistan, a statement by the National Center for Seismology (NCS) said.

item.title: "Anything We Can Do, We Will Do": Trump On Ahmedabad Plane Crash

media:content.media:description: Donald Trump spoke about the Air India plane crash in Ahmedabad durind a press briefing.

item.description: US President Donald Trump spoke about the tragic plane crash in India on Thursday, offering any support the United States can provide as investigations are under way to ascertain what the reasons were that led to the incident.
item.content:encoded: US President Donald Trump spoke about the tragic plane crash in India on Thursday, offering any support the United States can provide as investigations are under way to ascertain what the reasons were that led to the incident.

item.title: Meet S Paul Kapur, Trump's Indian-American Pick For South Asia Diplomatic Role

media:content.media:description: Mr Kapur was earlier part of the US State Department's policy planning team.

item.description: Delhi-born S Paul Kapur was nominated by the Trump administration for a diplomatic role in South and Central Asian affairs.
item.content:encoded: Delhi-born S Paul Kapur was nominated by the Trump administration for a diplomatic role in South and Central Asian affairs.

item.title: All About Rabindranath Tagore's Ancestral Home In Bangladesh, Vandalised By Mob
item.description: Nobel laureate Rabindranath Tagore's ancestral home, the Kachharibari in Bangladesh's Sirajganj district, was vandalised by a mob following a dispute between a visitor and museum staff over a motorcycle parking fee.
item.content:encoded: Nobel laureate Rabindranath Tagore's ancestral home, the Kachharibari in Bangladesh's Sirajganj district, was vandalised by a mob following a dispute between a visitor and museum staff over a motorcycle parking fee.

item.title: Trump Warns Israel Strike On Iran "Could Very Well Happen"

media:content.media:description: US President Donald Trump has said that Israel may be preparing to strike Iran's nuclear facilities

item.description: The president emphasised that the conflict could still be avoided if Tehran agrees to further concessions in ongoing negotiations with Washington.
item.content:encoded: The president emphasised that the conflict could still be avoided if Tehran agrees to further concessions in ongoing negotiations with Washington.

item.title: US Couple Beats Autistic Girl, 3, To Death After Getting Angry Over How She Chewed Food

media:content.media:description: Raymond Johnson was described as "the nice one" by other foster children.

item.description: A couple in the US have been arrested for allegedly beating their 3-year-old "special needs" foster daughter to death.
item.content:encoded: A couple in the US have been arrested for allegedly beating their 3-year-old "special needs" foster daughter to death.

item.title: 'Godfather Of AI' Now Fears It's Unsafe. He Has A Plan To Rein It In

media:content.media:description: The intense competition in AI leads to shortcuts and safety concerns. (Representative)

item.description: This week the US Federal Bureau of Investigation revealed two men suspected of bombing a fertility clinic in California last month allegedly used artificial intelligence (AI) to obtain bomb-making instructions. The FBI did not disclose the name of th
item.content:encoded: This week the US Federal Bureau of Investigation revealed two men suspected of bombing a fertility clinic in California last month allegedly used artificial intelligence (AI) to obtain bomb-making instructions. The FBI did not disclose the name of th

item.title: Why Are Sunsets So Pretty In Winter? There's A Simple Explanation

media:content.media:description: A good sunset is made by clear skies, low humidity, and the Sun sitting low in the sky. (Representative)

item.description: If you live in the southern hemisphere and have been stopped in your tracks by a recent sunset, you may have noticed they seem more vibrant lately. The colours are brighter and bolder, and they linger longer in the sky.
item.content:encoded: If you live in the southern hemisphere and have been stopped in your tracks by a recent sunset, you may have noticed they seem more vibrant lately. The colours are brighter and bolder, and they linger longer in the sky.

item.title: Economists Explain How A 'Global Wealth Tax' On Billionaires Would Work

media:content.media:description: In Australia, the maximum applicable tax rate for companies is 30%.

item.description: Earlier this year, I attended a housing conference in Sydney. The events opening address centred on the way Australia seems to be becoming like 18th-century England a country where inheritance largely determines ones opportunities in life.
item.content:encoded: Earlier this year, I attended a housing conference in Sydney. The events opening address centred on the way Australia seems to be becoming like 18th-century England a country where inheritance largely determines ones opportunities in life.

item.title: Axiom Launch To Send Shubhanshu Shukla To Space Deferred For Rocket Repair

media:content.media:description: The Axiom-4 mission was again deferred on Wednesday.

item.description: The launch of the Axiom-4 mission that will carry India's second astronaut to space was postponed for a fourth time on Wednesday.

item.title: Year Before Ahmedabad Plane Crash, Whistleblower's Boeing 787 Dreamliner Flaw Claim

media:content.media:description: A whistleblower accused the company of putting profit over safety last year.

item.description: Air India's flight AI 171, with 242 on board flying to London, crashed shortly after takeoff in Ahmedabad this afternoon, in one of the worst aviation disasters in aviation history.
item.content:encoded: Air India's flight AI 171, with 242 on board flying to London, crashed shortly after takeoff in Ahmedabad this afternoon, in one of the worst aviation disasters in aviation history.

item.title: Jealous Man Says He "F****D Up" After Killing Ex-GF For "Hurting His Feelings"

media:content.media:description: A Southern Illinois man confessed to shooting his ex-girlfriend in 2023 after a bad breakup

item.description: On April 7, the 27-year-old pleaded guilty to the murder of Alexis Maki. He shot Ms Maki multiple times in her apartment, The Belleville News-Democrat reported.
item.content:encoded: On April 7, the 27-year-old pleaded guilty to the murder of Alexis Maki. He shot Ms Maki multiple times in her apartment, The Belleville News-Democrat reported.
